content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal mine at position (x)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position x1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2)

### Iron plate factory at position (x)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position z1)
- Inserter (position a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### Iron gear wheel factory at position (x)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position z2)
- Inserter (position b) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the iron plate factory to the assembling machine at position(z2)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, crafting iron gear wheels requires iron plates, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to furnace inventory
- Regularly check the furnace inventory to ensure it has the necessary items for crafting and extraction.
